sentences.sContent: ...those emissions reductions that are least costly to implement will happen first...
...and anticipations cited above have failed so miserably because their authors and promoters thought the transitions they hoped to implement would proceed unlike all previous energy transitions...
...Governments in developed nations devise and implement policy that changes consumer expectations...
We have decided to implement the committee’s recommendations in full.
sentences.sCn: 我们已决定全面实施委员会提出的建议。

remMethod.val: im(使…) ＋ ple(满) ＋ ment → (使)圆满 → 使生效，贯彻实施

words.tran: 器具的；有帮助的；可作为工具的

trans.tranOther: a tool, especially one used for outdoor physical work
to take action or make changes that you have officially decided should happen
